Calculate antibody counts per A-node

node_markers_counts.Rd

Computes and returns a data frame of antibody counts per node (vertex) of the A node graph given a component edge list as input. The parameter k allows to include neighbors (of each node) when computing the counts. k defines the number of levels when searching neighbors.

If k > 0, edgelist_to_simple_Anode_graph is used to calculate an A-node projected graph.

Usage

node_markers_counts(component_edge_list, k = 0)

Arguments

component_edge_list

An object of class tbl_df

k

Number of neighbors to include

Value

A matrix with node marker counts
